SELECT o.orderId, m.memId, m.memNm, o.orderProduct, o.orderDate, o.amount, o.orderStat FROM orders as o JOIN member as m ON m.memId = o.memId
where o.orderId LIKE CONCAT(#{content})
where o.orderProduct LIKE CONCAT('%',#{content},'%')
where o.memId LIKE CONCAT('%',#{content},'%')
ORDER BY o.orderDate desc
limit #{startRow}, #{pageSize}
select goodsNo, goodsNm from product where goodsNm LIKE CONCAT('%',#{content},'%')
